plans_onetime.text: You get: Builder lapel pin (for new Builders). Editorial reports. Swag giveaways. Tyee event discounts. That warm fuzzy feeling that comes with doing something good.
You get: Everything in the previous level, plus twice as many warm fuzzies.
You get: Everything in the previous level, plus big imaginary high fives from those who care about the state of our democracy.
You get: Everything in the previous level, plus the purr of a thousand kittens (theoretically).
You get: Everything in the previous level, plus FREE registration to a Tyee Master Class webinar on investigative research taught by Tim Groves (April 13 & 14, 2015). Limit 50.
You get: Everything in the previous level, plus an invitation to an annual strategy session with Tyee editors
